content: space between each double_crochet/single_crochet cluster double_crochet single_crochet chain 2 repeat around repeat round 2 until desired height sample shown 10 rounds ~5- 5 5 bag top round 1 hbhdc into every other st around 44 sts rnds 2 5 hbhdc in each st around round 6 hbhdc for 19 sts should be 1 stitch before the side of the bag see stitch and abbreviation section for instructions or view this tutorial on instagram i-cord strap 1 slip_stitch into next 2 sts keeping all loops on hook 3 loops on hook 2 drop first 2 loops hold them taut 3 working from 3rd loop on hook slip_stitch 1 place 2nd loop back on hook slip_stitch 1 place 1st loop back on hook slip_stitch 1 4 repeat until desired strap length is reached approx half = 16 inches shown to join strap line up with 3 sts on opposite side drop the live loops putting them on the outside of the bag and insert hook from inside to outside through both the bag stitch and the dropped loop slip_stitch to join each of the 3 loops continue final round of hbhdc across the remaining half of the top edge fasten_off optional clasp chain 30 leaving 2 tails on each end pull each tail through the top center of the bag approx 1 2 apart tie or secure inside sew button to opposite side to align with loop finishing weave in all ends securely you are done congrats now show off your finished bag on social media and send me a pic don t forget to leave feedback follow me on instagram or facebook @tknitsboutique pics of bag this pattern is ©tknits 2025 personal use only redistribution prohibited small-scale sellers may use this pattern to create and sell finished products but credit to the designer is required in listings and tags mass production is not allowed thank you for respecting handmade creativity
